table.name: vtiger_bhssearchorderss
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhssearchorders` ( `bhssearchordersid` int(19) NOT NULL, `bhssearchorders_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhssearchordersid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhssearchordersscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhssearchordersscf` ( `bhssearchordersid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhssearchordersid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
